trans-unit.source: By default, all requests to App Service Mobile App resources are restricted to clients that present the application key, which does not strictly secure access to resources.
trans-unit.target: By default, all requests to App Service Mobile App resources are restricted to clients that present the application key, which does not strictly secure access to resources.

trans-unit.source: To secure your resources, you need to restrict access to authenticated clients only.
trans-unit.target: To secure your resources, you need to restrict access to authenticated clients only.

trans-unit.source: In Visual Studio, open the project that contains your Mobile App code.
trans-unit.target: In Visual Studio, open the project that contains your Mobile App code.

trans-unit.source: In Solution Explorer, expand the Controllers folder and open the TodoItemController.cs project file.
trans-unit.target: In Solution Explorer, expand the Controllers folder and open the TodoItemController.cs project file.

trans-unit.source: The TodoItemController class implements data access for the TodoItem table.
trans-unit.target: The TodoItemController class implements data access for the TodoItem table.

trans-unit.source: Add the following using statement at the top of the code page:
trans-unit.target: Add the following using statement at the top of the code page:

trans-unit.source: Apply the following AuthorizeLevel attribute to the TodoItemController class:
trans-unit.target: Apply the following AuthorizeLevel attribute to the TodoItemController class:

trans-unit.source: This will ensure that all operations against the TodoItem table require an authenticated user.
trans-unit.target: This will ensure that all operations against the TodoItem table require an authenticated user.

trans-unit.source: Apply the AuthorizeLevel attribute to individual methods to set specific authorization levels on the methods exposed by the controller.
trans-unit.target: Apply the AuthorizeLevel attribute to individual methods to set specific authorization levels on the methods exposed by the controller.

trans-unit.source: If you wish to debug authentication locally, expand the App_Start folder, open the WebApiConfig.cs project file, then add the following code to the Register method:
trans-unit.target: If you wish to debug authentication locally, expand the App_Start folder, open the WebApiConfig.cs project file, then add the following code to the Register method:

trans-unit.source: This tells the local project to run as if it is being hosted in Azure, including honoring the AuthorizeLevel settings.
trans-unit.target: This tells the local project to run as if it is being hosted in Azure, including honoring the AuthorizeLevel settings.

trans-unit.source: Without this setting, all HTTP requests to localhost are permitted without authentication despite the AuthorizeLevel setting.
trans-unit.target: Without this setting, all HTTP requests to localhost are permitted without authentication despite the AuthorizeLevel setting.
